entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Need a Reliable Way to Check to See if a Type is a Record Class #108531
  • Expose a new `JsonSerializerDefaults` that is better tailored to Azure applications. #108526
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix swift lowering for InlineArray when static field occurs before instance field #108522
  • [System.Text.Json] Expose a setting disallowing duplicate JSON properties #108521
    10.0.0
  • RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds at dotnet.native.wasm.mono_jiterp_tlqueue_purge_all #108519
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet core successor of System.IdentityModel.Configuration for Security Token Service #108518
  • Regression in net9.0 when calling a ServiceClient from a dynamically loaded Assembly #108517
  • Geo Spatial Analysis in .NET Core 10 #108536
  • [mono] MiniJIT System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests getting killed #108515
  • ARM64-SVE: Use INC* when incrementing with GetActiveElementCount()/CountXBitElements() #108511
  • [browser] OutOfMemoryException after bad allocation ratio #108510
    10.0.0
  • [WASI][Mono] allocating pages with alignment wastes memory #108509
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect IL2026 for [RequiresUnreferencedCode] on type deriving from A<B> where B has new() in A<T> definition #108507
    10.0.0
  • Investigate VN-based implied assertions #108504
    Future

Closed

  • JIT: nullcheck is not folded for PHI #104489
    10.0.0
  • debsums reports REPLACED for /usr/lib/mono/fsharp/FSharp.Core.dll #108505
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support in IsoWeek #101597
    Future
  • .NET 8: String interpolation with IPAddress has breaking change #108491
  • iOS Release can't build with CosmosDB #101967
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expand ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType, HashAlgorithmType #100361
    10.0.0
  • [browser][mt] JSWebWorker crashes the runtime #102010
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add project to create helix work items for host tests #108529
    area-Host
  • Trim analyzer: fix member reported for generic warning #108528
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Tighten cdac_data friend declarations #108525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Android] Put Java JNI function in a separate static library #108513
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [browser] memory leak repro #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix minor markdown formatting errors/inconsistencies #108508
    documentation, area-Meta, 10.0.0

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix wrong Region Info Names #108524
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108496
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • JIT: remove fgAddCodeList #108527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Backport PR #108311 - Fix statics issue with barriers #108347
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix `InlineArray` swift lowering in mono #108483
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108470
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108212
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix buffer dropped reason in ConfigurableArrayPool #108461
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Added DateOnly overload methods to IsoWeek #108479
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Fix wrong Region Info Names #108466
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use default timeout for launching the browser in WBT #108474
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Interpreter Fixes #108485
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix rooting JSWebWorkerInstance #108475
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108467
    Servicing-approved, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Improve software exception handling performance #108480
    tenet-performance, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix ILLink behavior for modreq types #108494
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106220
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify IsComObjectType checks #108487
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta
  • Fix differences between bash and cmd versions of crossgen test script #108500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • ILLink: Avoid warning for RUC field rooted as part of a root assembly #108498
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108499
    area-System.Globalization
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use architecture independent code paths in Array #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [release/9.0] Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108486
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [no merge][interp] align check atomic ops on wasm #106963
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET SDK Finalizer Feature Band calculation doesn't match SDK's calculation #43876
  • `dotnet workload restore` runtime jumps from 25 seconds to 4 minutes when nuget feed is AzDO instead of nuget.org #43870
  • `dotnet workload restore` fails on macOS when a project uses an SDK that is not yet in the package cache #43869
  • Hot reload does not work on Linux when the project name has a period (.NET 9 RC1) #43861

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS #43885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for Aspire #43884
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix for source-build stage 2 compiler errors #43879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix extension comparison #43877
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Revert "Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools (#43045)" #43872
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix writing dotnet test results when terminal logger is off #43871
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Read RunSettingsFilePath property and send as env var in dotnet test #43868
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #43821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Show dogfood annotation in prompt #43846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update manpages for 9.0 #43776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2549754 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #43843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43631
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Restore ability for users to consume the containers package easily #43794
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Delete old crossgen conditions #43840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline expression in attributes #75367

Closed

  • Gracefully handle incomplete property setter in object initializer #74348
    Backlog
  • Build host should localize message output #74902
  • Possibly unexpected error when a ref field is passed as an argument #75082
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix suggestions for dotted constant patterns in Color Color case #75373
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add keyboard shortcut for 'Add null checks' in generate constructor #75370
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cycles in constant initializer #75366
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Visit collection expression elements as r-values in NullableWalker #75365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't update xaml tool #75348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • LSP hover responses escape backticks within inline code #75364
    VSCode, Next
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update status for `field` keyword feature #75356
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Make the types in CSharp Features sealed #75352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2551591 #75361
    auto-merge
  • Log and report NFW when we fail to apply project system update #75362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during typing #75351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations and UI thread CPU costs in WithDoNotCreateCreationPolicy #75358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructor in rename command handler #75336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75363
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, 17.13
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable OverflowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods test #75357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest` #58231
  • OpenApi Enums generating no schema #58230
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext #58227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58226
  • Per file size limit in multipart form #58225
  • RegistryXmlRepository Does Not Dispose Registry Key #58224
  • Exception is raised in when setting interactivemode in blazor server authentication type enabled web app project #58222
  • OpenAPI ArgumentNullException for type parameter when using versioned route #58219
  • Allow the configuration of ServiceProviderOptions when using the WebApplicationBuilder #58217
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json #58216
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58215
  • Bootstrap 5.3.3 upgrade breaks Blazor template styling #58214
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Loading progress .svg in the default Blazor template causes a Cumulative Layout Shift on the <body> tag #57212
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Azure B2C login issue with Blazor Webassembly #58223
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58203
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #58210
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi should allow overriding the schema for specific types #56448
    9.0.0
  • Support multiple response types with the same status code in ApiExplorer #55412
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add retry for test Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #58232
  • [release/8.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58229
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58228
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #56114 #58218
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Avoid unnecessary HealthStatus comparison #58176
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable signing on Non-Windows builds #58191
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24479.2 #58153
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: Button not resizing on text Change #25074
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Documented VisualStateManager Button/Entry examples throws an exception #25069
  • Tab bar handler issue Android #25064
  • Why is button event click not working inside AbsoluteLayout for Window #25063
  • DeploymentManagerCS is back - app can't start #25062

Closed

  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc2
  • OrientationStateTrigger does not work if in the setters of the state TargetName is used #22001
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Exception "this element is not in a namescope" when using Setter with TargetName for VisualState = Normal #16208
    Backlog
  • Tab bar showing at the top instead of bottom in ios 18 #25065
  • Narrator is not announcing the status message as result found when results are found and visible status message when result is not fond for search recipe edit filed : A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_Search box_screen reader #22845
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • When keyboard focus is on "Korean egg roll" recipe of my recipe list and press ENETR/SPACE key recipe is not opening: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes_My Recipes_Keyboard #22823
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [META] Xcode 16.0 Support for .NET 8/9 and MAUI #24819
  • In MacCatalyst App Email.Default.IsComposeSupported always returns false in macOS!!! #24991
  • High crash rate: 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellPageRendererTracker+TitleViewContainer' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument. #24938
  • Frame + Shadow ignores TapGestureRecognizer #22518
    Backlog
  • .NET 8 MAUI Android - Storage.Preferences returns default value when executed whilst the application isn't open/running #23837
  • Shadow Offset Style breaks Android in Release mode #24601
  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() #24035
  • MAUI template missing in visual studio 2022 17.12 #24888
  • Role-based authorization not working correctly when using Blazor WebView in MAUI App #24874

PullRequests

Created

  • [tests] CV 2 devicetests #25078
  • WIP: HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and tests #25076
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #25075
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    community ✨
  • Fix Switch view has inconsistent colors when "off" #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    community ✨
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9] Try fix running UITests on iOS18 #25070
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25056
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #25024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • (Re)enable Mail API for Mac Catalyst #24998
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Correct small inefficiency in private internal function in EFCore - FindIndexerPropertyInfo #34823
  • UseAzureSql is missing #34820
  • MigrateAsync with targetMigration causes issue with down Migration #34819
  • ComplexProperty column name mapping ignored when loading via FromSql() #34818
  • Compiled Model causes InvalidOperationException on first call #34817

Closed

  • ChangeTracker.HasChanges() returns false even when entries are marked for deletion #34804
  • Cannot specify backing field for nested owned entities. #34780
  • Define an Unidirectional Many to Many without Join Table #34775
  • Add support for ComplexProperty fields in alternate key configurations #34794
  • Problems .Net8 Microsoft.EntityframeworkCore.Design 8.0.8 with ReportViewerCore.NETCore 15.1.19 or upper #34782

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update dependencies #34822
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies #34821
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Reverting the BinSkim target directory #34813

Updated

  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • Fix tags for final GroupBy queries #34787
  • [release/9.0] Use 8.x Microsoft.Extensions.* packages #34769
    providers-beware, Servicing-approved

PullRequests

  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #20146

Updated
